name: Raspberry-Coconut Bars
author: Steve Kochin
summary: These delicious coconut bars are made out of a cookie dough layer, raspberry jam, and a sweet coconut topping. A treat throughout the year.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons softened butter, plus more for baking dish
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cream butter and sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer
Add milk and egg yolks; mix dough to combine
Combine 2 1/2 cups flour, baking powder, and salt in a small bowl; add to dough and mix to combine
Press cookie layer into the prepared baking pan
Spread raspberry jam over the base layer in the baking pan
Beat eggs in a bowl until foamy
Add flour and keep beating until bright yellow
Mix in sugar and softened butter; beat until well combined
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Turn the pan so bars bake evenly
Continue baking until topping is set, 15 to 20 minute more
Remove from oven and cool on a wire rack
